author: minfrin
msg: Move the public mod_request.h header out of the include directory and back to modules/filters.
The current build of exports.c assumes that everything in include is part of the core, and so
putting the header there creates link errors.

author: ruwan
msg: Fixing the issue SYNAPSE-269, now you can configure synapse to invoke the actuall service over dual channel using the separateListener attribute of the enableAddressing element of the endpoint.

author: tabish
msg: Forcing certain methods in Math to not be built on Windows since there are no libraries on windows that include these math functions.

author: mcombellack
msg: TUSCANY-2228 When an attempt to inject an invalid value into a property is made, the exception that is thrown now contains the name of the Proerty in Exception message to aid in diagnosing the problem
